::Shredder::

Shredder nods, relaxing in his chair. He looks around, noting Mantella's grin.

Shredder frowns. He was extremely bored. There have been way too litle 
threachery and backstabbing lately for his taste. He stands up.

"I'll go spy on Quickstrike or something," he says, setting off to the 
equipment room to get a cloaking device.
